nodes.text: A piercing was a ring or other item worn pierced through the skin as a decorate item. Members of the Jiivahar species wore piercings, as did some Amarans.
Myri Antilles was given a pair of earrings for her birthday in 43 ABY by her father, Wedge Antilles. The set had laser scalpel cores that were activated with a twist.
Bartender Tiggs Leo had several facial piercings.
